---
name: Escalation request
about: Request a new escalation packet (level-1/2/3) for an incident
title: "[escalation] <incident> level-<n>"
labels: ["escalation"]
---

## Incident folder
Path (e.g., `water-heater-replacement/`):

## Target escalation level
- [ ] level-1 (vendor / warranty / dealer)
- [ ] level-2 (corporate / management / executive)
- [ ] level-3 (state AG / regulator / dispute channels)

## Who is the recipient?
Company + department + any reference numbers.

## Remedies requested
What do you want them to do?

## Required attachments
List what must be included (photos, estimates, warranty excerpts, etc.).
